summary: The diff adds a new React entry module (frontend/src/main.authz.tsx) that wraps <App /> with AuthzProvider (alongside QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider) and updates frontend/index.html to load this new entry file. No evidence in the diff indicates changes to frontend/src/App.tsx or the immutable frontend/src/main.tsx. However, the diff also introduces unrelated visual/UX changes in index.html (critical CSS) and modifies project_state.json, neither of which were requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed critical inline CSS in index.html to prevent white flash on load (background/color styling). This is a visual/design change not requested and is listed as a non-goal.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists changing visual design/layout/animations as non-goals; adding new global/critical CSS in the HTML entry is not necessary to wrap the app with AuthzProvider.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json with scope/summary content unrelated to wrapping the app with AuthzProvider.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for a new entry file and updating index.html; no requirement mentions changing project_state.json.
